```{r}
install.packages("jtools")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(jtools)
```


```{r}
AQ <- read.csv("AmazonQuarterlyRevenues_2021_Data.csv")
```

```{r}
qplot(AQ$Period,AQ$QR)
```

```{r}
logQR <- log(AQ$QR)
logQR
```

```{r}
qplot(AQ$Period,logQR)
```

```{r}
reg.QR <-lm(data=AQ, QR ~ Period)
summary(reg.QR)
```

```{r}
confint(reg.QR,'Period',level=0.8)
```

```{r}
pred1 <- data.frame(Period = 83)
predict(reg.1, pred1, interval="prediction",level=0.95)
```
```{r}
reg.2 <-lm(data=AQ, lagQR ~ Period)
summary(reg.2)
```

```{r}
reg.logQR <-lm(data=AQ, logQR ~ Period)
summ(reg.logQR)
```
```{r}
confint(reg.logQR,'Period',level=0.95)
```

```{r}
predlogQR <- data.frame(Period = 83)
predict(reg.logQR, predlogQR, interval="prediction",level=0.95)
```
